repos.excerpt: bUp is a CLI tool for Windows to back up folders as zip files. Includes commands for adding, removing, and managing backups.
BingeFlix is a Google Chrome extension automating 'Skip Intro' and 'Next Episode' buttons on Netflix, for seamless binge-watching. Customizable settings menu included.
Portfolio website built with React and Typescript showcasing my projects, with a Python tool for easy data updates and new project page generation.
Discord bot which keeps track of movies to watch for groups, using the OMDB API to save and show movie information. It also uses ChatGPT to have fun conversations and make comments like Adam Sandler.
"Hivemind" is a game project in C# using MonoGame, featuring robots collecting ores in a procedurally generated world.
Scrappy is a Python bot that scrapes job postings from LinkedIn, filtering out irrelevant ones and sending job details via Telegram messages. It simulates human browsing behavior to avoid detection.
